backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing leads in a Map with add, get, and list query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing hero slider features, related files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of all frontend components, pages, hooks, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color variables, dark mode tokens, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, loading Inter font, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling client-side routing and rendering either standalone pages or the homepage sections.
frontend/src/components/contact/CompanyP: Modal dialog that collects basic company details, validates input, submits a lead, and triggers a company profile download on success.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactO: Grid of contact options including strategy call booking, company profile download dialog, email link, and WhatsApp link handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright, attribution link, and dynamic year with branding.
frontend/src/components/forms/ControlLea: Lead generation form collecting company and challenge details, validating input, and submitting a lead with a success confirmation view.
frontend/src/components/forms/FounderCon: Inquiry form for the Founder Control Blueprint collecting company, operational, and contact details with validation and lead submission.
frontend/src/components/forms/Industries: Industry-specific lead generation form requesting company details and bottlenecks, validating inputs, and submitting a lead with a thank-you state.
frontend/src/components/forms/InsightsNe: Newsletter subscription form with validation, lead submission, and success state handling.
frontend/src/components/forms/ProcessLea: Lead generation form collecting company, industry, revenue, and challenge details with validation and submission.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section displaying email, phone, location, and a button to schedule a strategy call.
frontend/src/components/sections/Control: Section explaining the CONTROL framework with a scrollable set of steps and images, plus navigation handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/Emotion: Section highlighting founder dependency issues and the need for system-driven operations.
frontend/src/components/sections/FinalCt: Final call-to-action prompting users to book a strategy call.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with a themed background and the main slider component.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSli: Interactive hero slider with autoplay, drag support, and multiple CTA-driven slides.
frontend/src/components/sections/Industr: Renders a grid of industry cards highlighting four target business categories with icons, titles, and descriptions, along with a styled background image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Insight: Displays a three‑card insights grid with titles, excerpts, categories, and a hoverable call‑to‑action, including a decorative header image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Outcome: Shows a list of operational outcomes with check icons and an accompanying dashboard mockup image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Problem: Lists five common business problems with icons and ends with a highlighted statement about systems issues.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Presents a four‑step transformation process with numbered cards and a background visual.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatIno: Displays three feature cards—Control, Clarity, Continuity—with icons and brief descriptions.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with hash scrolling, client-side routing, mobile sheet menu, and strategy-call CTA.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Submits lead data through the backend actor and exposes loading, success, and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Returns whether the user’s system prefers reduced motion by tracking a media query.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines custom CSS variables for light/dark mode with brand colors and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/contactConfig.ts: Exports configurable URLs for calendar booking, WhatsApp, and company profile links.
frontend/src/lib/strategyCall.ts: Opens the configured calendar URL or falls back to a mailto link for strategy call booking.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with hero section, contact options, inquiry form, and qualification details.
Displays the CONTROL framework overview with details for each step and a CTA to book a strategy call.
frontend/src/pages/IndustriesPage.tsx: Shows industry-focused content with hero section, business focus details, and lead generation interactions.
frontend/src/pages/InsightsPage.tsx: Presents insights categories, featured article previews, and a hero section for the insights portal.
frontend/src/pages/ProcessPage.tsx: React page rendering the multi-section Process overview with hero, philosophy content, and staged process layout using UI components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing features, requirements, and planned updates for the homepage hero slider transformation.
